text_id: Apabila telah datang pertolongan Allah dan kemenangan
text_en: WHEN THE HELP of God arrives and victory,

text_id: dan engkau melihat manusia berbondong-bondong masuk agama Allah,
text_en: And you see men enter God's discipline horde on horde,
transliteration: wa ra`aitan-nāsa yadkhulụna fī dīnillāhi afwājā

text_id: bertasbihlah dengan memuji Tuhanmu dan mohonlah ampun kepada-Nya. Sesungguhnya Dia Maha Penerima tobat.
text_en: Then glorify your Lord and seek His forgiveness. Verily He is relenting.
transliteration: fa sabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika wastagfir-h, innahụ kāna tawwābā
